textBeforeTable: Previous versions Follow the onscreen prompts to complete the installation. Click Next. Ensure that "Save files in folder" is set to C:\IBMTOOLS\DRIVERS\QJ9Z31US. Click Next. Click I accept the terms in the license agreement. Click Next. Read the license agreement. Double-click the qj9z31us.exe icon. Type qj9z31us.exe in the search field, then click Search Now. This will locate the file you just downloaded. Click Start, click Search, then click For Files and folders. Installing the update When prompted, select a drive and directory in which to save the downloaded file. Click the file link to download the file from the Web page. Downloading the update If you have installed special mouse drivers or mouse software on your system, other than the Standard PS/2 Port Mouse, Microsoft PS/2 Port Mouse, or PS/2 TrackPoint drivers, please uninstall them before installing the ScrollPoint II/Wheel mouse drivers. Before installation
